use-tagify-comment: Use Tagify to display tags | default: false
use-submit-comment: true -> analyze input while typing / false -> use of submit button to process ('submitButton' has to be defined) | default: false
waittime-comment: Set time to wait for processing after keyboard input | default: 1000

categories.assign-top-comment: true -> return category of found keyword / false -> return the keyword itself | default: true
categories.include-top-comment: Include name of the categories themself as keywords | default: false

openthesaurus-comment: Add call to openthesaurus API to enrich words (experimental) | default: false
